name: Kreature Killers - IGMC2017
description:
My first game where I did the programming (if you can call event manipulation programming). Basically the core of a Monster Hunter experience in the form of a Gameboy like RPG. There are a few features I still wanted to implement so maybe after the contest I'll get to that for my own sake. Hope you enjoy!

***
